mapper.select: select max(reg_date) as reg_date from vocabulary.voc_word where user_id = #{userId};

select m.mean_id, m.definition, m.seq, w.word_id, w.word, date_format(w.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_ymd, date_format(w.reg_date, '%m-%d') as reg_md from vocabulary.voc_mean m left join vocabulary.voc_word w on (w.word_id = m.word_id) where w.user_id = #{userId} and w.reg_date = #{reg_date} order by m.mean_id;
